Brian Shea Hedberg

Nice Ride Microsite

The Nice Ride Microsite project was a collaborative project between Nice Ride, the City of Minneapolis, Clockwork Active Media, and Hedberg Maps, Inc., sponsored by Allina Health. I was part of the Hedberg Maps Inc. team for the project, but collaborated with the folks at Clockwork as well.

Check out the site here.
